name: Counter Attack
description:
We're excited to announce that our location-based entertainment (LBE) game has been adapted for online platforms and is now available on Steam. The game was originally designed to be an experience that could only be enjoyed in a specific location, but we've adapted it to be a unique online experience. We've made some minor changes to the game and are releasing it in Early Access, but we'd love to hear your feedback to make it even better. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, and we look forward to creating new online experiences together!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Immerse yourself in the intense world of "Counter Attack," a gripping defense-based first-person shooter that propels players through a narrative-rich journey, challenging them to withstand relentless waves of enemies.

In the distant future, a pinnacle of artificial intelligence emerges—a cyborg born of cutting-edge science and the forefront of human innovation. However, this triumph of technology becomes a dire threat as a radical terrorist organization unleashes a legion of artificially intelligent cyborgs. Transformed into merciless killing machines, these cyborgs swiftly thrust humanity to the edge of annihilation.

Now, the remnants of humanity rally for a counterattack against the relentless onslaught of the cyborg menace. As you step into the shoes of the last defenders, gear up for an epic battle where survival is not just a choice but a necessity. Can you thwart the mechanical onslaught and rescue what's left of humanity from the brink of destruction? The fate of the future rests in your hands.
